faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: If you have anything else you want to ask,

q1.question: What is PayMatch?
q1.answer: PayMatch is a Swiss invoicing platform designed specifically for Swiss businesses. It helps you create, send, and reconcile Swiss QR-bill invoices with ease.

q2.question: How does QR-bill generation work?
q2.answer: PayMatch automatically generates compliant Swiss QR-bills with all required information, including VAT calculations and proper formatting for Swiss banking standards.

q3.question: Can I integrate with my existing accounting software?
q3.answer: Yes, PayMatch offers integrations with popular accounting software and can export data in various formats for easy import.

q4.question: Is my data secure?
q4.answer: Absolutely. We use bank-grade security measures and comply with Swiss data protection regulations to keep your data safe.

q5.question: Do you support multiple currencies?
q5.answer: Yes, PayMatch supports both CHF and EUR with automatic currency conversion and proper formatting for Swiss and European markets.

q6.question: What about Swiss compliance?
q6.answer: PayMatch is built specifically for Swiss invoicing standards and automatically ensures compliance with Swiss VAT regulations and banking requirements.
